articles.title: California cop punches handcuffed woman in face, caught on video - CBS News
articles.description: Officers were called to L.A. suburb of Westminster about a run-in between an Asian and a Hispanic woman.
articles.content:
A Westminster Police Department officer has been placed on paid administrative leave after cellphone video showed him punching a handcuffed woman twice in the face, CBS Los Angeles reports.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Regional NGOs urge ASEAN to include ousted Myanmar lawmakers in crisis summit - Rappler
articles.description: Myanmar's junta chief General Min Aung Hlaing is expected to attend the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) summit in Jakarta, Indonesia
articles.content: ASEAN's members include Myanmar, Brunei, Cambodia, Indonesia, Laos, Malaysia, the Philippines, Singapore, Thailand and Vietnam.
